meaningMnemonic: With a <radical>roof</radical> over her head, a <radical>woman</radical> can <kanji>relax</kanji>. She doesn't have to worry about rain or snow or finding a place to sleep. The roof also happened to be super <kanji>cheap</kanji>, so she can even relax about her finances.
readingMnemonic: As she <kanji>relax</kanji>es, she pulls out the <kanji>cheap</kanji>est, most relaxing food in the world: <reading>an</reading>chovies (あん).
